Here are the identified "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. "decrease of series resistance" - This is a property value referring to the reduction in the resistance of a series component.
2. "increase FF" - FF, in this context, likely refers to a figure of merit in electronics, such as the "figure of merit" for a MOSFET device. The increase in FF implies an improvement in the performance of the device.
